cont.entity_a: Offers nearly as good accuracy as a wired mouse. Excellent accuracy for gaming.
Ergonomics are excellent, providing comfort for right-handed users.
cont.entity_b: Ergonomic design with excellent battery life using NiMH rechargeables. Not suitable for left-handed users. Some users report difficulty with button presses due to ergonomic design.

cont.entity_a: Includes two batteries for easy swapping. Battery life depletes rapidly during moderate gaming. Battery life typically lasts 7-10 hours on a full charge. Fast battery switch is convenient.
cont.entity_b: Rechargeable batteries last about three months with 8 hours of daily use. Excellent battery life using NiMH rechargeables.

Mouse is comfortable with lots of options.

cont.entity_a: Texture of the sides is rough plastic, unlike previous models with soft rubber.

cont.entity_a: Does not fit well into the palm.
cont.entity_b: Mouse is large but still portable.
